A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite some flaws\, this is the most grown-up Star Wars movie of all. The characters are deep and flawed\, and their actions drive the story. The action sequences are thrilling\, with some true jaw-dropping\, gasp-out-loud moments. I don't think the Finn and Rose storyline is completely successful\, but to me\, the chances Rian Johnson has taken pay off with satisfying oomph\, and I can not wait to see where we get to go next.
